website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a manicure table with some user-friendly features, a good build, and a low price, this one has a lot to offer.
pros: An affordable table with ample space and a sturdy yet comfortable wrist cushion
Folds easily for travel and storage and includes a carrying bag
Doesn't take up too much space
cons: Customers say the storage tray has a tendency to slide around

customer_reviews.title: and the quality is good too. I like that it comes with a ...
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived very quickly, and the quality is good too. I like that it comes with a bag, so you can fold it up and carry it.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the money! Travel size table for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette subia

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners without a lot of space!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I got this delivered and felt how heavy it was. It does not feel cheap at all which is a very good thing! Easy to carry with the bag. It’s not too heavy where it’s uncomfortable to carry but it’s not flimsy and cheap-feeling. Not regretful of this purchase one bit.
customer_reviews.author: katelynn barnes

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Its shorter than expected sonmake sure you get shorter chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect loved that it came with a zipped storage bag
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and well made. The little drawer in the bottom slides back and forth both ways, not sure if I like that but overall it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Travel sized; great for house calls.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today! Surprised it was not heavy at all. About the same weight as my other table. HOWEVER I was surprised it was sooo short and the width isn’t as wide as I thought it would be. Overall it’s a travel/portable table and works exactly for that. The bag is also a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Itsjustme

customer_reviews.title: ... it for free male female friend she said it's fantastic in her business and she enjoys it thank
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for free male female friend she said it's fantastic in her business and she enjoys it thank you
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN WINSTON

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The table is as pictured but its kinda short and Im 5'7 so ill have to use a lower chair. Other than that I love the little drawer, handrest and design☺️ This is Great for beginning techs
customer_reviews.author: Star leone

customer_reviews.title: Perfter for house calls
customer_reviews.text: I love the table for $100 bucks I can take it with me love that. I do house called so this table is perfect. It is kinda wobbly but it will work. The top of table did have some very faint scratches. Other then thoughts two things its great...
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Check reviews before buying! Looks used!
customer_reviews.text: Got the table in a decent time. Very upset. Took it out of the box and it’s all scratched up. Looks used. Very upsetting. Also not a lot of room to have stuff on the table. Make sure and check the height before you buy because it is a short table.
customer_reviews.author: Iindsey19

customer_reviews.title: The drawer is too long.
customer_reviews.text: The table is a tad too short, the drawer too long. When you try to put the drawer into the slot, it sticks out one end or the other too much. Other than that, I think it's a great portable table!!! I would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Dull tabletop
customer_reviews.text: Hey just got my nail table today ordered in on Monday I believe. Very pretty except it looks a bit scratched on the surface. I was expecting a brand new shiny table top. It’s kind of dull and looks used. Besides that it’s Sturdy and seems good to use. I’m worried about the heights being too short but I will see once I get chairs. It came with bag and arm rest. You will need to screw the arm rest down to make it stay. Should’ve been cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Green

customer_reviews.title: Save you money and your time
customer_reviews.text: Not built very stable... Got two and both not very stable
customer_reviews.author: babydawhl

customer_reviews.title: Know exactly what you're getting before order
customer_reviews.text: Picture is different from what you expect stop deceiving people.
customer_reviews.author: Shash

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this table it is very convenient. I can use it at home or when I travel to clients. Its easy to put away when you are not using it. Im.glad i made this purchase. I am a new nail tech I reccomend beginners to make this purchase as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: The folding mechanism is easy to
customer_reviews.text: Table was exactly what I expected. The folding mechanism is easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: John Giordano

customer_reviews.title: P65 warning!!!! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this table up until I notice that it has a P65 warning on it that causes cancer! I wish it was disclosed online before I bought it. Now I have to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Grace Brazier

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of this table however
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this table however, when I took it out of the box it was extremely scratched and has gouge marks in several places. I'm very unhappy with the table surface. The size is great for a portable nail station
customer_reviews.author: Rachele

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve been a little bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it’s a nail tech table but it’s so tiny could’ve had a bit more space so everything wouldn’t be so cluttered
customer_reviews.author: cherie

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. Just a bit too small tho. And drawer does not stay in table which can be annoying. Is it was taller it would help tremendously
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Manicure Table
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and is exactly as the description specifies. Worth the price. I wish it had more space, but is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne White

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I just started doing my own nails and it's just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: T Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this product. It's a little heavier than I had anticipated. But otherwise I liked the size of it . It is supposed to be portable not a full sized table. I liked the finish on it. It suits its purpose well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $80
customer_reviews.text: Love the table just wish it was taller and the fact that the tray came cracked & beat up is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: shaniece hooks

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be higher.
customer_reviews.text: It is A very good table, but is too small.
customer_reviews.author: NABN

customer_reviews.title: Not for professionals.
customer_reviews.text: The table is for toddlers. Very short. Flimsy. Not for profesional use at all.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Anaya

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: THIS TABKE BROKE WITHIN 3 USES EMBARASED ME WITH MY CELEBRITY CLIENT WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: NailedbyNikkiLash

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Good table, good height, prefect for the two chairs I purchased. However, the wrist rest scratches the top of the table and the drawer gets in the way. I remove it when doing nails.
customer_reviews.author: SheLuvsGodTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: The table came damaged one of the legs of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The table came damaged one of the legs of the table were off when I opened the box you could clearly see that the leg was taken off and too i looked in the box to reattach the leg myself but the screws weren't in the box... pictures coming soon it was a gift for my mom it's at her house
customer_reviews.author: osrah

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great, this was a gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, this was a gift for Christmas. My girlfriend loves it and I gotta say the detail is pretty stellar!
customer_reviews.author: James O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: The table is great. However the storage drawer can slide out from ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is great. However the storage drawer can slide out from either side which I preferred it didn't. I had to add a stopper there to keep it from doing that. I may have products or valuables in there and the fact that my client could possible open it is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. London

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel only
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose although I believe it to be a bit on the flimsy side.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Arnold

customer_reviews.title: it isn't sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this... it isn't sturdy at all. I triple checked to make sure the legs were locked and it still is uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, not too heavy, easy to take for house calls. Very nice arm rest.
customer_reviews.author: DeeMinX

customer_reviews.title: Excited to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design on this table. The zipper on the carry bag was stripped but I am not too worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister, she loves it. Does not take a lot of space and is easy to store or pack it and take it with you. Has enough room on the table itself to work.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/broken
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I unboxed this and unfolded the legs one of them snapped right off. So cheaply made, I never even got to use it. Save your money for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony McGirt1

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Perfect for what I need it for. It’s the perfect size and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Islas

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a low price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for on the go easy to assemble any where for fast nail service as a home office or any friends house. Arrived fast too
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my nail table everything i perfect. The only thing I wish it was was adjustable height as I feel it’s a little too low. But I make it work
customer_reviews.author: Terrica Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It broke while I was pulling out one of the legs of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Matthews

customer_reviews.title: This table is super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This table is super cute!! Folds up, has a drawer, hand rest, and even came with a bag to transport. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This table is wonderful , especially for the price . It even comes with a bag to carry it on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it pergect for my salon room
customer_reviews.text: I love it pergect for my salon room. Good quality. Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: lorie grover

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice manicuring table but I wish she was a little bit more taller
customer_reviews.author: Consquella Townsel

product_meta.title: Giantex Nail Table Station Portable Manicure Tech Desk with Free Bag Case Sliding Drawer Leather Hand Pillow Spa Beauty Salon Technician Equipment Nails Art Table Set w/Lockable Wheels
feature_bullets: 【Top Quality Standard】: The whole body of our portable manicure table is made of great material meeting our top quality standard. High density particle board, durable metal Legs and heavily padded drawer, all of them can give you wonderful nail polishing experience. What's more, the structure of legs is similar to the triangle, which is stable enough to hold large weight. We know stability is important to a good table.

【Foldable & Portable Design】: The two legs of our nail table are attached to four wheels. You can push it around pretty easily. It saves much time. And the wheels can be clocked when you want the table to stay one place. If you want to take the table outside, you can fold it up and put into the bag. We gave the bag for free! The corner of the table is rounded to prevent damage caused by collision.

【Comfortable to Use】: Our manicure table nail desk focuses on practicability. Large and long drawer is perfect to keep your accessories well organized. The removable wrist cushion is heavily padded, super comfortable to lie your hands on for a long time. A waterproof zippered carry bag for convenient storage & easy transport.

【Large Size】: Table Top: Approx. 35.4"x15"x27" (LxWxH) Spacious tabletop can leave enough space for you to beautify nails besides the nail art equipments. It's even a really good size for personal use and professional mobile salon.

【Nail Beauty for YOU】: You no longer bother yourself to go to beauty salon only for expensive nail art. Our portable nail table is suitable for any traveling manicurist or blogger who need a station. The special flower patterns - Desktop pattern design look very beautiful, you will love it!
